text: World Cancer Research Fund International is a not-for-profit association related to cancer prevention research related to diet, weight and physical activity. ==See also== * "Food, Nutrition, Physical Activity and the Prevention of Cancer: a Global Perspective" – an expert report published by the World Cancer Research Fund global network in 2007 ==References== ==External links== *Official website Category:Cancer organisations based in the United Kingdom Category:Cancer research Category:International medical and health organizations
title: World Cancer Research Fund International
